Game.Name: Jashin Draxos (Japan, Korea)
Game.plot: Prepare to risk it all! The ancient monks who preserve the wisdom of the Lost Lands have been frozen in stone. Young Rohan must plunge into the Risky Woods to release them. Only then can wisdom triumph once again! Battle your way through Risky Woods and murky caves. Encounter stomping skeletons and treacherous traps. Overcome terrifying flying fiends as they attack from above. Rescue the monks, but... be prepared for one last battle up ahead!Cheat: Level SelectGet killed and make sure you have a high score. Put in EOA as a name, and when you select options, you can choose which level you want to start on!
